mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reviewlikes WHERE review_num=#{reviewNum} AND user_id=#{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviewlikes (rl_status, user_id, review_num) VALUE (#{rlStatus}, #{userId}, #{reviewNum});
mapper.update: UPDATE reviewlikes SET rl_status=#{rlStatus} WHERE review_num=#{reviewNum} AND user_id=#{userId};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reviewlikes WHERE review_num=#{reviewNum} AND user_id=#{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN rl_status='LIKE' THEN 1 END ) 'like', COUNT(CASE WHEN rl_status='BAD' THEN 1 END ) 'bad' FROM reviewlikes WHERE review_num=#{reviewNum};
